alert.note: Alert for Bell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 25 at 10:19AM EST until February 26 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Cumberland River at Pineville affecting Bell County. For the Cumberland River...including Cumberland, Baxter, Pineville, Barbourville, Williamsburg...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Cumberland River at Pineville. * WHEN...Until just after midnight Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EST Friday the stage was 997.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 979.5 feet Wednesday morning. - Action stage is 995.0 feet. - Flood stage is 1002.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued at 7 PM Friday, February 25th.
